pr_title: Add property skipIfIndirectlyCalled to annotation CalloutMethod

timeline.message: set "manualPrice" to Y if user manually edits priceEntered

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	 * Use case: you want a callout to do stuff only if invoked by a user (or business logic).
          
          
            
            	 * Use case: you want a callout to do stuff only if invoked *directly* by a user (or business logic).
timeline.author: metas-ts
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -59,4 +59,10 @@
 	 * Skip calling this callout if we are copying (with details).
 	 */
 	boolean skipIfCopying() default false;
+
+	/**
+	 * Skip calling this callout if it is called via another callout.
+	 * Use case: you want a callout to do stuff only if invoked by a user (or business logic).
